name: sliming (itch)
description:
Imagine you are a little slime and you think your world is beautiful and nice... but then you realize you have to finish all those other slimes to be the only true one. only then you will rest in peace.

yeah... I guess thats the story.

Try to hit other players with slime strikes from above meanwhile collect fancy colored slimes to boost your champ, its quite chaotic but funny and fast!

A game for 2 or 3 players

Controls

Player 1:  WASD +Q

Player 2: Arrowkeys + L

Player 3: ZGHJ + Space

better artworks coming soon :^)
